name: On Your Shoulders (AntyCo)
description:
On Your Shoulders is a game I m making for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2

The theme was "You're not alone".

Basicaly, you play as up to 5 blocks (i dunno how to name them), separately.

Example: when you play green, it will from now on follow the same moves it "recorded" while you play as orange, and after that both green and orange will redo their moves when you play as cyan and so on.

The objective of each level is to collect the coins of the same color as the character you're playing as.

Controlls:

Menu: WASD - move, Enter - enter level

Level: W - jump, AS - move, L-Shift - crouch, Enter - Finish recording, Backspace - Restart, Esc - go to menu

Update 0.3:

Added levels - 1-: 6, 7, 8

2-: 3, 4

3-: a, b (glitch levels)

made map bigger and added few things

Leaving the level - Esc
